title: An autoscaling/suggestions endpoint to recommend operations
description:
Autoscaling can make suggestions to users on what operations they can perform to improve the health of the cluster
The suggestions will have the following information


	http end point
	http method (POST,DELETE)
	command payload

comments.content: I think we can already support this by using HttpTriggerListener configured to capture the output from ComputePlanAction.
